attributes.action: Upgrade Government PC's to Windows 7, NOT Windows Vista
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is upgrading their PC's to Windows Vista. 

There is no earthly excuse of going to Vista now: a newer, better, less resource hungry, but fully supportable, workable and manageable solution is there - Windows 7.

If the Government do go to Windows Vista they are likely to stay out for years to come, without changing to Windows 7, even if the test prove to be good enough for them to move. Lets get the UK government up to date.
